title: Why can't I get into the PBE
body: My good bud has a PBE account and he's never good with games he doges a lot and afks so much and I never afk but i will doge to play with my buds so I was wondering how do you get into the PBE when you sent a request so long ago maybe a year now I waited and never a yes or no it's just hard to deal with and I just don't under stand how do i qualifi for the PBE{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Our criteria for how we select PBE testers changes all the time. In general, we look for players who would give great feedback and are very active players. Sometimes if we're looking to test specific content, let's say a support rework, we'd look for players who main support champs and send out a batch of invites that way.

Full details are outlined in our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Please let me know if you have any questions.
thank you for the time it was informative.
